hero_subtitle: Expert-led live sessions that build fluency, precision, and presence — on your schedule, at your pace.
metric_1_label: more speaking time than group classes
goals_title: What do you want to unlock?
goals_subtitle: Choose your goal — we'll build your path
goal_1_p: Land the job. Nail the interview. Command the room in meetings and presentations.
goal_2_p: Finally sound the way you think. Speak naturally, clearly, and without hesitation.
goal_3_p: Crush IELTS, TOEFL, or university speaking tasks with targeted practice and feedback.
how_subtitle: Three steps to becoming the speaker you want to be
how_step1_p: A quick strategy call to understand where you are and where you want to go.
how_step2_p: We match you with an expert who adapts to your needs in real-time. No scripts. No apps.
how_step3_p: Practice what matters. Track your growth. Feel the difference within weeks.
learn_subtitle: Every skill your voice needs to be taken seriously.
testi_subtitle: Our coaches have helped hundreds of learners find their voice.
testi1_quote: "I went from dreading English meetings to leading them. The improvement happened faster than I expected."
testi2_quote: "My IELTS score went from 6.5 to 8.0 in eight weeks. The targeted speaking practice made all the difference."
testi3_quote: "Finally I sound confident, not apologetic. My coach helped me find my authentic English voice."
